'''Johnny''' is a firefighter in [[Seattle]] who helped with the rescue efforts following the Super Storm and resulting mudslide.

==History==
When [[Alex Karev|Alex]] suggested that the first responders donate blood, Johnny immediately offered. When asked about [[Lydia Ashford|Lydia Ashford's]] house, Johnny informed Stephanie that it was Lydia who had triaged the patients.

==Career==
Johnny is a firefighter for the [[Seattle Fire Department]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*Johnny was credited as Firefighter.
